title: Cover
description: Ovoid form with sharp shoulders.  Opaque orange/brown glaze with large irredescent patches that reach near the flat base.  Interior: unglazed.  b) Flat cover with small circular knob circumscribed.  Gold paper around ivory on inside.  Paper blackened in some areas.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cover.
earthenware. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1938-57-342-a,b.
